title: Publication of recommendations
context: ยง96-13 Publication of recommendations. After a reasonable time has elapsed, the ombudsman may present the ombudsman&rsquo;s opinion and recommendations to the governor, the legislature, the public, or any of these. The ombudsman shall include with this opinion any reply made by the agency. [L 1967, c 306, ยง14; HRS ยง96-13; gen ch 1985]
